pkgmetadata.longdescription: Stepped Wedge Cluster Randomized Trial (SW CRT) Design // A set of tools for examining the design and analysis aspects of stepped wedge cluster randomized trials (SW CRT) based on a repeated cross-sectional sampling scheme (Hussey MA and Hughes JP (2007) Contemporary Clinical Trials 28:182-191. doi:10.1016/j.cct.2006.05.007).
